text: Ferruccio Valcareggi (12 February 1919 – 2 November 2005) was an Italian football player. ==Honours== ===Player=== Bologna *Coppa Alta Italia: 1945–46 ===Coach=== Prato *Serie C: 1956–57 Italy *UEFA European Championship: 1968 *FIFA World Cup runner-up: 1970 ===Individual=== *Seminatore d'oro: 1956–57, 1972–73 *Italian Football Hall of Fame: 2011 *Fiorentina Hall of Fame ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2005 deaths Category:Footballers from Friuli-Venezia Giulia Category:Italian football managers Category:Sportspeople from Trieste Category:A.S. Roma managers Category:Italy at UEFA Euro 1968 Category:Italy at the 1970 FIFA World Cup Category:Italy at the 1974 FIFA World Cup
title: Ferruccio Valcareggi
